pageContent: Introduction: Prostate cancer is themost prevalent and deadliest neoplasm in men, with adiverse clinical presentantion and oncological outcomes.The diagnosis and treatment remains a challenge.New essays about biomarkers show their potential asa tool that may influence in clinical decision making,risk stratification and management of the disease.

metaData.source:
Attitudes and beliefs about prostate cancer and screening among rural African American men
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/19175247/
